name: Love Makes a Family Kit
description:
The "Love Makes a Family" Fundraiser Tree Kit is the premier package for families adopting from anywhere across the globe!  Perfect for families pursing domestic adoptions or international adoptions, or both. Ready for your friends and family to fill with their fingerprints and signatures, this tree will be a beautiful reminder of all the love involved in the adoption for years to come. Check out all the ways this tree can be used to raise money and get your little bundle of joy home at: http://leavesoflove.blogspot.com/

This kit includes:

One 24x36 "Love" Tree (image approximately 20x28) printed on high quality paper with Epson HDR Inks, large enough for approximately 100-150 signatures.

Custom Ink Pack which contains a four pack of Tsukineko Momento Inks and a fine tip black marker. The ink pack comes with four inks, three shades of green and one red (for parents to make a special heart on the tree and write a little message). The inks come in a wooden display case customized with the phrase "one less" in honor of your adoption. The perfect keepsake to hold and display your inks!

name: Small Africa Kit
